name: Riverbend Family Saga
description: A multi‑generational family lives on a modest farm in rural Mississippi, balancing tradition, economic strain, community ties, and the dreams of younger members. Seasonal work, church gatherings, and the ever‑present Mississippi River shape daily life, while generational values clash and co‑operate in an ever‑evolving story.
